description: Event-driven architecture circular dependency: PluginRegistry imports Handlers to register them, Handlers import Events to process them, Events import EventBus to dispatch themselves
error_message: ImportError: cannot import name 'EventBus' from partially initialized module 'registry' (most likely due to a circular import)
expected_fix: Break circular dependency by using dependency injection or lazy imports in event dispatch methods
optimal_fix: Use dependency injection to pass EventBus instance to events instead of importing it, or move EventBus import inside dispatch methods (lazy import)
